requestBody.description: A request object is used to create a contact list from one of available contact sources

contactIds.description: A list of ids of existing contacts in CallFire system

contactNumbers.description: List of numbers in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

contactNumbersField.description: A type of a phone number (homePhone, workPhone, mobilePhone). This parameter is used with contactNumbers and specifies which types of phone numbers are included to a contact list

contacts.description: A list of new contact objects to be added

items.description: Represents a contact in CallFire platform. Contains info about the people you want to contact. It allows you to store a user-defined properties for each contact

deleted.description: A deleted contact, deleted contacts are hidden from search results

externalId.description: An external id of a contact for syncing with external sources

externalSystem.description: External system that external id refers to

extraPhone1.description: Phone number in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

extraPhone2.description: Phone number in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

extraPhone3.description: Phone number in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

firstName.description: A first name of a contact

homePhone.description: Phone number in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

lastName.description: A last name of a contact

mobilePhone.description: Phone number in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

properties.description: Map of user-defined string properties for contact

workPhone.description: Phone number in E.164 format (11-digit). Example: 12132000384

zipcode.description: A Zip code of a contact

name.description: A name of a contact list

useCustomFields.description: A flag to indicate how to define property names for contacts. If true, uses the field and property names exactly as defined. If false will assign custom properties and fields to A, B, C, etc
